songs.title: Sinful
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I lost my spine inside the center of a star
And every day I wonder where the bad bones are
You'll die an ugly day
If you hit and miss
I know my own granddaddy worked so hard for this

[Chorus]
It seems so sinful living like a porcupine
I know you're dreaming of the time when you were mine
It seems so sinful
It seems so sinful
Oooooh-oooh

[Verse 2]
You kicked me out and hung a rope down from the roof
The Christians came out, they watched me tie my noose
I spoke a silent prayer
They began crying
They knew that I'd applied to hell, they knew I got in

[Chorus]
It seems so sinful living like a porcupine
I know you're dreaming of the time when you were mine
It seems so sinful
It seems so sinful
Oooooh-oooh

[Bridge]
It seems so simple now
Oooh
It seems so sinful
Oooh

[Outro]
It seems so sinful
It seems so sinful
Oooooh
It seems so sinful
It seems so sinful
Oooooh
It seems so sinful
It seems so sinful
Oooooh
